channel.title: 718 admins cant trade
channel.description: im trying to make it so admins cant drop or trade but i still can as i am the owner but every time i try to put the code in trade.java i get an error can someone please teamview me or skype? skype name: terrorun

item.title: 718 admins cant trade
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

At the start of the trade request just do a simple check, ie

if (player.getRights() == 2) { return; }

Canâ€™t help you more without the compiler error and some of your code. Disabling dropping will be done in the drop item packet handling in an identical manner.
